title: Drawing, October 1856
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on dark brown paper
markings:
Recto: Stamped in black ink, at lower left: Museum for Arts of Decoration - Cooper Union [Lugt 457c]
Verso: Stamped in black ink, at lower center: Museum of Arts of Decoration - Cooper Union [Lugt 457c]
inscribed: Dated in graphite, at lower right: Oct 1856
provenance: Louis P. Church, Hudson, New York
description: A view of the eastern end of the Horseshoe Falls with the tower is shown at the center of the sheet. The falls crash dramatically downward onto rocks below.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, October 1856.
October 1856. Graphite, brush and white gouache on dark brown paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-33-b.
